TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PropertyCollection extends System.Collections.Hashtable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of properties that can be added to <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn">, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The PropertyCollection can be accessed through the `ExtendedProperties` property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class.
Add custom properties to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects through the PropertyCollection. For example, you may want to store the time of the object's creation for later comparison to another object.
## Examples The following example creates a timestamp value for a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and adds it to the PropertyCollection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData PropertyCollection Example#1)]
